```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# packages
library(data.table)
library(meta)
#library(metafor)
#library(dmetar)

library(showtext)


font_add_google("Poppins", "Poppins")
font_add_google("Roboto Mono", "Roboto Mono")
showtext_auto()


#tdata.wide <- read.delim("dummy_data.txt", header=TRUE, sep="\t", na.strings="NA", dec=".", strip.white=TRUE)
madata <- read.delim("EffectSizes_of_Studies.txt", header=TRUE, sep="\t", na.strings="NA", dec=".", strip.white=TRUE)


```


```{r}
# Now conduct the MA 
# see: https://bookdown.org/MathiasHarrer/Doing_Meta_Analysis_in_R/effects.html 

m <- metagen(TE,
             seTE,
             data=madata,
             studlab=paste(Author),
             comb.fixed = FALSE,
             comb.random = TRUE,
             prediction=FALSE,
             sm="SMD", 
             method.ci = "z")
m
```


```{r}
forestplot <- forest(m,
                     xlim = c(-0.5,2),
                     lab.e = "Direct",
                     lab.c = "Indirect",
                     digits.sd = 3, 
                     col.diamond = "blue", 
                     col.fixed = "blue",
                     leftlabs = c("Experiment", "N","Mean","SD","N","Mean","SD"),
                     rightlabs = c("Hedge's g", "95%-CI", "Weight"),
                     smlab = "Effect",
                     text.fixed = "Overall (fixed) effect", 
                     print.tau2 = FALSE, 
                     pooled.totals = TRUE,
                     fontfamily = "Poppins")
```


```{r}
svg(file = 'ForestPlot_dilution.svg', width = 8.5, height = 5) 

forestplot <- forest(m,
                     xlim = c(-0.5,2),
                     lab.e = "Direct",
                     lab.c = "Indirect",
                     digits.sd = 3, 
                     col.diamond = "blue", 
                     col.fixed = "blue",
                     leftlabs = c("Experiment", "N","Mean","SD","N","Mean","SD"),
                     rightlabs = c("Hedge's g", "95%-CI", "Weight"),
                     smlab = "Effect",
                     text.fixed = "Overall (fixed) effect", 
                     print.tau2 = FALSE, 
                     pooled.totals = TRUE,
                     fontfamily = "Poppins")
dev.off()

forestplot
```



```{r}
# subgroup analysis 
# devtools::install_github("MathiasHarrer/dmetar")
library(dmetar)

sgmae <- subgroup.analysis.mixed.effects(x = m,
                                subgroups = c(madata$Target.Cause))

```

```{r}
subgroup<-update.meta(m,
                      byvar=c(Target.Cause),
                      comb.random = TRUE,
                      comb.fixed = FALSE)
subgroup

forest(subgroup)
```


```{r}
svg(file = 'ForestPlot_dilution_subgroups.svg', width = 8.5, height = 6) 


forestplot <- forest(subgroup,
                     xlim = c(-0.5,1.5),
                     lab.e = "Direct",
                     lab.c = "Indirect",
                     digits.sd = 2, 
                     col.diamond = "blue", 
                     col.fixed = "blue",
                     leftlabs = c("Experiment", "N","Mean","SD","N","Mean","SD"),
                     rightlabs = c("Hedge's g", "95%-CI", "Weight"),
                     smlab = "Effect",
                     text.fixed = "Overall (fixed) effect", 
                     print.tau2 = FALSE, 
                     pooled.totals = TRUE, 
                     resid.hetstat = FALSE,
                     fontfamily = "Poppins",
                     bylab = "Strength query",
                     layout = "RevMan5")
dev.off()

forestplot


pdf(file = 'ForestPlot_dilution_subgroups.pdf', width = 8.5, height = 6)
```
